meanings.definition: To verify or confirm by checking again
meanings.sent1: She was counterchecking the answers to make sure they were correct.
meanings.sent2: He always double-checks his work by counterchecking the details.
meanings.sent3: The detective was counterchecking the alibi of the suspect with great attention.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was like a constant counterchecking mechanism, ensuring accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The process of counterchecking can prevent errors from slipping through.
